welcome_message_body: "Welcome to La Grange, a charming city known for its historic architecture and southern hospitality. We invite you to explore our quaint streets, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dutchess County Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Dutchess County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orange County Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Orange County Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, duty-free shopping, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport caters to private jet and charter flights, providing a luxurious and convenient experience for travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to stay connected during their travels.
